director.name: 米奥德拉格·乔尔杰维奇 Miodrag Djordjevic

introduction: Miki Djordjević was one of the first directors and cinematographers of Serbia, who came from Bruce. His film "Under the Yugoslav sky", recorded 1934. , was the first Yugoslav travel movie.The documentary "Under the Yugoslav sky" is the first feature sound film made in the Kingdom of Yugoslavia (1934.), who owes much more to the silent period, but introduces a sound when it is the most important, namely, when king Alexander Karadjordjević, soon to be assassinated in Marseilles, speaks for the first time on camera.
